de.esoco.ewt

Class GewtMaterial

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.ewt.GewtMaterial

  • public class GewtMaterial
extends java.lang.Object
    The central management and factory class for the GEWT wrapper of the GwtMaterialDesign library.

      • applyIconType

        public static void applyIconType(java.lang.String sIcon,
                                 gwt.material.design.client.base.HasIcon rHasIcon)
        Determines the IconType constant for a string containing the icon name to a widget. If the type cannot be matched a default will be used and a resource error will be logged (with GWT.log(String)).
        Parameters:
        sIcon - The icon name in upper case
        rHasIcon - The widget to apply the icon to

      • checkApplyAlignment

        public static void checkApplyAlignment(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsWidget rWidget,
                                       de.esoco.ewt.style.StyleData rStyle)
        Applies any alignment settings from a style data to the given widget.
        Parameters:
        rWidget - The material widget with alignment
        rStyle - The style to check for alignment

      • checkApplyButtonScale

        public static void checkApplyButtonScale(gwt.material.design.client.base.AbstractButton rButton,
                                         de.esoco.ewt.style.StyleData rStyle)
        Applies any button scale settings from a style data to the given button.
        Parameters:
        rButton - The button widget to apply the size to
        rStyle - The style to check for alignment
